body.name: KINGBERWI 3 Tier Bathroom Corner Organizer Countertop, Vanity Counter Skincare Makeup Storage Shelf, Bathroom Sink Countertop Organizer, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Decor Home Organization - Modern and simple design, The shelf organizer is both decorative and functional! Doesn't take much horizontal space but adds more vertical shelf space. Perfect for organize all of your bathroom essentials or other cosmetics

Size - Each Measures 6.7*6.7*17inch. Countertop organizer frees up a lot of space on counter and better to have your products easily displayed! Maybe you can place all skincare products on this cute little shelf

Durable Material - The vanity organizer made from stainless steel and durable shatter-resistant plastic. The metal frame that hold it up are sturdy and the white hard plastic shelves are easy to snap on and off to clean
Adjustable 3 tier Corner Shelf - The shelves are adjustable, 5 vertical positions to choose, you can adjust the height of your shelves for your needs

Easy to Assemble - Don’t worry about installation. No screws or tools needed, only takes 2 minutes, you'll get a bathroom corner sink organizer. KINGBERWI provides you with professional customer service both before and after your purchase to ensure you have a nice shopping experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Tier Bathroom Countertop Organizer, Bathroom Sink Countertop Storage Shelf Modern and simple Nordic style design, countertop organizer can be matched well with most household style! If you have a lot of bathroom products, cosmetics or other items, it will be a great choice for you and can nicely display this items as well.
Makeup Organizer for Vanity Bathroom Counter Organizer
The 3-tier vertical structure does not occupy the counter space but can well organized and orderly stored. Adjustable trays, which can be adjusted up and down according to the needs of storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it! It is great for small spaces. My bathroom counter is really small and I needed more space. I was worried it would be too big but it is perfect. Just what I need. It was easy to put together and very sturdy. It took me less than 5 minutes to put it together. If you need a little extra space, go for it. I plan to buy another one for the kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job! Great tool
reviews.reviewText: I think I saw in another review that aesthetically it’s like something out of a hospital. Fairly on point! Really, it is not the most attractive item, but it is simple and neutral, and for me it is doing an extremely important job: getting all my cosmetics off my bathroom counter. I figured out how to put it together pretty quickly and it fits perfectly in the corner. And all of a sudden like three dozen little jars and tubes and bottles are neatly organized. I am thrilled

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not the most beautiful, but does the job
reviews.reviewText: No assembly instructions provided - there's little notches at the corner and edge of each shelf, where the verticals of the two metal sides slot/snap into; they rest on the horizontal part of them near the bottom, on the bar just below the top, and any other pair of horizontal bars in between (the middle one, as shown). I found it helped to tip the outer edge of the shelves up to get them into their spaces, then push them down into position, once the bottom shelf was on and I had to do both sides at once.I got it to use in the bathroom, as we haven't got nearly enough counter space for how many of us share the one sink. We got lucky: the cream shade of the plastic shelves actually matches our marble sink/counter perfectly, and it's the perfect size for the available space, so it looks decent in here - but the plastic shelves aren't going to win any awards for beauty. In a kitchen I'd go with an all metal or wood shelf model instead, and in a bathroom that isn't cream/beige, I wouldn't go with this one even if you go for plastic.Probably less an issue with spices, but in the bathroom, many taller products (mouthwash, some facial cleansers, hairspray) don't fit between the lower shelves. I might try moving the middle shelf up a "rung", if we find we need more room for that taller stuff, but fortunately we all seem to be using hair goo that comes in tubs, and those can stack 3-4 high between shelves no problem.Bottom line: I can now use the sink without knocking things off the counter or moving them first. It fits where I wanted to put it, and does what it needs to. In MY bathroom, it looks pretty good, but I would only recommend it for a similarly colored space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My home was recently renovated & the tension rod corner shelf I had been using for years on my sink no longer fit so I had to find an alternative. I’m very partial to my tension rod corner shelf so it’s been hard to find something suitable. This is the 2nd shelf I bought & it’s the next best thing to my beloved tension rod corner shelf. The other shelf I bought (not this product or company) was too big & bulky. Anywho it’s a great space saver nonetheless. I’m still going to have my husband try to rig the tension rod back onto the sink counter but that’ll probably take a couple of years to get him to come around to it so until then I’m rocking this shelf

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gaining space for precious "stuff"
reviews.reviewText: This is a super idea for your bathroom. You can put all your cosmetics, fragrances, and beautifying tools in this one little space and leave the rest of your counter free of confusion. It's perfect to stay organized, yet have the appearance of order in your common space. This is truly a great idea!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overpriced but sturdy and just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This shelf came unassembled, which I expected, and the pieces look cheap. There were no assembly instructions but thankfully I am pretty good at putting things together. I did struggle a tiny bit to snap the shelves onto the metal parts but I did finally figure it out. When it was all put together, it felt quite sturdy. It wasn't wobbly or loose. I put it on my bathroom counter and put bottles of vitamins, pain killers, etc., on it and it held up. Overall, I'm happy with this shelf even though it's overpriced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple assembly, useful, & looks nice! Just what I was looking for…
reviews.reviewText: We have a corner toilet, so definitely needed a corner thing… It can’t be too wide because there’s a light switch & it can’t be too deep because it’s a toilet lid!And this is EXACTLY what I was looking for - something to hold the every day shower spray & cloths that I use.It’s literally pop together in less than 5 minutes & done. (There’s a 3rd shelf that I’m not using since the 2 bottles are tall.)There are no downsides to this: if the measurements fit what you need, it’s a great buy.**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** 😊

reviews.reviewerName: It looks amazing in my bathroom ! I love it It looks amazing in my bathroom ! I love it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for small spaces

reviews.reviewText: Justo se adapta a lo que necesitaba, tamaño compato ideal para encimeras pequeñas. Los pisos se fijan muy fuerte a los marcos y se pueden colocar de diferente forma a lo sugerido asi que me tome unas libertades sin problema y quedo perfecto. Tiene rebabas en el plastico pero al menos no se notan una vez armado y en uso.
